intro: Mestoklema, commonly known as the African daisy, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Asteraceae. Mestoklema species typically have narrow, grass-like leaves and produce small, clustered flower heads. They are often found in open, sunny habitats such as grasslands and rocky outcrops. The genus includes several species, some of which are cultivated for their ornamental value.
